title: DERMALA, A Consumer Dermatology Company, Announces Issuance of the ...
body: DERMALA developed a novel technology for enhanced targeted delivery of human microbiome-derived postbiotic metabolites into specific layers of the skin.

title: DERMALA CEO AND FOUNDER INVITED AS SPEAKER AND ... - Markets Insider
body: DERMALA, Inc. is a San Diego -based company leveraging a scientific understanding of the human microbiome and data analytics to develop novel personalized treatments for chronic skin conditions.
